title: Maruti, Hyundai, Tata Motors, Renault post record rural sales in 2023
description: Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai Motor, Tata Motors, and Renault India achieved their highest-ever share of sales from rural markets in 2023. While rural demand for fast-moving consumer goods and consumer durables was affected by inflationary pressures, car sales in rural areas saw double-digit growth.
